title: A Thief in Venice
description: Two thieves. One painting. One very dangerous game.For seven years, Lucia Petrucci has stolen a painting every year to keep the memory of her parents alive. But now she has made a mistake. She has crossed the most dangerous man in Venice. Antonio Moretti, Head of the Thieves Guild.She has stolen from Antonio, and he wants retribution. Can Lucia pay his price?Note: A Thief in Venice is a stand-alone story, but part of the Nights in Venice series. Other stories in this series are of different couples. This story includes spankings, domination, graphic sexual scenes, and more.
author: Tara Crescent
